name: Captain Frogger
description:
One day when a Gorilla was taking a walk, a family of Frogs jumped toward the Gorilla.
The Frogs just wanted to hug their good friend Gorilla, but the surprised Gorilla tried to repel the Frogs.
The Gorilla and the Frogs are best friends, though!

■ How to play

Repel the jumping frogs. The frogs jump upward and downward. Repel them with kicks and punches at the right timing.
The trick is to carefully observe the jumping direction!
Repel the frogs in succession to get a higher score!

■Game features

It's a very simple game. All you have to do is to distinguish the jumping direction of the frogs and click. But be careful. It’s insanely difficult!
If you are good at action games, you can aim for a high score. Practice in easy mode for a start!
Maybe y’all gamers can reach an S rank in normal mode?!
It might not be easy to achieve an S in hard mode, but... good l

■About use in video and live broadcasting

You can use it freely regardless of whether it is for profit or not.
